HelpMessage: If no arguments are entered, the selection mode selection screen is displayed.
ModeSelectMessage: [1] : Minecraft server mode (server support and registration to the list)

SetupMessage: Are you new to setting up this list server?
If you wish to make the file public outside of the local area, please open TCP port 50384 on your router or other device.
Logs including IP information are recorded in listserver.log in the log folder.
If you have more than a sensible number of accesses (DOS, etc), you may want to router block the IP.
Do you want to create it?
